Now, Morning Musume。 23 and Ochanoma have performed together at the winter tour and Hima Fest,
How was it?
Yes, it was great. I learned a lot from Morning Musume。 23 taught me a lot of things,
I think I was able to absorb a lot of things by seeing them up close on stage.
It was a fun tour where we learned a lot from each other.
I also had the impression that there were many members who became good friends.
I also got to hang out with Maruka Saito in private,
I also had the chance to hang out with Maruka Saito in private, so I was happy about that as well.
Morning Musume。 23 is currently in the middle of its spring tour.
I think we just finished the first half of the tour,
We are going to Miyagi, Osaka, Shizuoka, Okayama, and Saitama during Golden Week.
We are very happy to be able to go to various places like this,
And after all, this is the 25th anniversary of Morning Musume。 25th anniversary,
I'm very happy to be going to various places like this, and also to be able to enjoy the history of Morning Musume,
I am very happy to be able to enjoy the moment with my fans while feeling the history of Morning Musume。
And, you know, on April 30, between tours, I will be performing with Airi Suzuki of Angelem at the Rocking On Presents Japan Jazz Festival.
I will also be performing at the Rocking On Presents Japan Jam 2023 with Ms. Airi Suzuki of Angulum.
I will be participating in the same event as last year, and I hope to make it a great success.
And Ocha-no-Oma will start its spring tour on May 3.
We will have concerts in Kanagawa Prefecture on May 3, Aichi Prefecture on May 6, and Osaka on May 21.
This will be the second tour, so I hope to show you a more improved version of Ocha-no-Oma.
Before that, I will be performing at the Hello Project Trainees' Presentation 2023 Spring Open Proficiency Test.
I will do my best. Thank you very much for your cooperation.

Morning Musume。 I'm going to ask you a few questions, so don't think too much and answer in a quick tempo.
Kirara Yonemura will turn 19 on April 30, so what do you want to accomplish in your teenage years?
What is the most important thing for you when you perform at events?
If you could have a holiday weekend like Golden Week, how would you like to spend it?
What is your make-up speciality? Raising my eyelashes!
What is your current goal for Ochanoma?
Wow, you're fast! Excellent!
I don't think that's what you mean.
I'd like to mention a few things that caught my attention... What do you want to accomplish as a teenager?
I want to go to Pilates... because I feel like I don't have enough muscles in my body.
I want to build up my muscles.
I don't know if I can do it or not, but I think it's really great that you can realize it while you're still in your teens.
I don't know if I can do it or not, but I notice it when I'm in my 20s and it's getting a little too much for me.
I see... I see... I think it's great that you can realize that while you're still in your 18s.
Please do it, and I'll make it happen!
I'll make it happen. I'm also very particular about my eyelashes.
Eyelashes. I do a lot of eyelash lifting.
There's a hot brower that raises lashes with heat, and I always set it to 80 degrees.
I set the temperature at 80 degrees Celsius all the time.
So you don't perm your eyelashes or anything like that, but you do it yourself every time?
Well, it's easier to raise them if they're not permed.
No, they're always shaggy. They look really beautiful from the side.
So you're really particular about it. I use about five mascaras.

I would like to ask Mr. Fukumura some questions. Please give me your best regards.

My stomach!
You have been addicted to pudding for the past six months.
Smoothness, bitter caramel, and overall atmosphere.

I would like to learn to play the drums.

To change the image of the first half and the second half.
This year marks the 25th anniversary of Morning Musume。 is celebrating its 25th anniversary this year. How would you describe Morning Musume。 In one word, how would you describe Morning Musume。
It is a form of love.
Thank you very much.
First of all, I was wondering about the pudding, do you like bitter caramel?
I like bitter. Pudding is sweet, isn't it?
It is sweet.
So I want the bitterness to wrap around the sweetness.
Oh, I see.
It depends on the type of pudding. Some have more sugar, some have more coffee, and so on,
Does it contain coffee?
There are puddings with so much sugar and coffee in them, that there are people who are particular about them.
I think the atmosphere is very important because it is fun and I see a lot of puddings.
I think the puddings in retro stores are bitter, aren't they?
I think most of them were bitter.
That's for sure.
I also think that most of the ones you can get at convenience stores have sweet caramel.
I have only had sweet pudding, but I would like to try it.
Please give it a try.
One more thing. One more thing about Morning Musume。 In one word, how would you describe Morning Musume。
A form of love.
It's wonderful.
I don't know what else to say,
I can't say anything else, but I can say that it is a form of love that has been passed down from seniors to juniors for 25 years,
And the juniors who carry on with the feelings of their seniors,
There are some members whose activities do not overlap with those of their seniors,
Some of the members have not been active in the group for 25 years, but they still love Morning Musume。 I think it's a way of passing on the feeling of the seniors to the younger members,
I also remember the time when I was a fan of Morning Musume。 I think that I will always keep those feelings in mind as I continue to be a member of the group,
I hope that the group will continue to do so for the next 30 to 40 years,
I hope that the group will continue to do so for the next 30 or 40 years.
I hope the group will continue to do so for 30 or 40 years.
I will do my best so that we can be a group that continues for a long time as adults.
I look forward to seeing you soon.

Morning Musume。 23's Sei Fukumura and Kirara Yonemura of Ochanouma are presenting Halo! STE, presented by Sei FUKUMURA of Morning Musume。
It's time for us to say goodbye, so here's an announcement.
Hello Project 2023 Spring City Circuit is now underway!
Morning Musume。 23 will perform in Miyagi on April 29th and Osaka on May 3rd!
And on April 30, I will be performing at the Rocking On Presents Japan Jam 2023.
This will be my first performance in a year, so I will do my best to give you another exciting stage performance this year!
Ochanouma Concert Tour 2023 Spring Growing Up will start on May 3!
This will be the second tour for Ochanouma, so all 10 of us will do our best!
And on May 10th, Ochanouma's first video work "Ochanouma First Live Tour" will be released!
Ochanouma's first live tour 2022 Start Dash will be released on Blu-ray on May 10!
Please come and see Ochanouma's beautiful performance!
And on May 17th, Morning Musume。 22 25th Anniversary Concert Tour
The Blu-ray and DVD of "Singing to the Beat: Graduation Special at Kagakai" will be released on May 17!
This is the last performance of the 13-member group, and it's going to be a hot one, so please get it!
The "Hello! Project members will be appearing more and more on this channel. New videos will be uploaded every Wednesday, so please subscribe to the channel!
We're still in the midst of a difficult time, but let's get through it together! This time, we'll be talking with Sei Fugumura of Morning Musume。 23's Sei FUKUMURA and
This time I'm going to talk with Sei Fukumura of Morning Musume'23 and Kirara Yonemura of Tea No Mame.
